WALKIE-TALKIE.captureErrorAudio: Unable to capture from your Audio device
WALKIE-TALKIE.debugHint: Enables debug and info logging levels
WALKIE-TALKIE.disableAvClientHint: If you are using another AV client such as the Jitsi WebRTC module, automatically disable your AV microphone when sending a message with Walkie-Talkie. Ignored when using "Toggle sending audio"
WALKIE-TALKIE.toggleBroadcastHint: Toggle the sending of audio to users instead of requiring that the microphone button be held down
